There's a familiar buzzing as you situate yourself, feeling the world around you slip away.

> [[ Calibrating, please wait... ]]

> [[ BROKEN SKY ONLINE ]]

Wait, what?

> [[ Update complete. ]]

You're standing outside the guild hall district. You feel normal, and nothing out of the ordinary seems to be underway in Averron at the moment.

Aelriss, Ayla, Cardus, Donnel, Nel, Smith, Tatsumaki, and Vision are online.

> [[ Contact Request: Crimson Guardian Liza ]]

What will you do?
